Summary: My second favorite of the four I tried
Text:
The Switch Kiwi Berry is very sweet, but tastes much better than the Orange Tangerine or the Black Cherry. It has a nice refreshing flavor though it's still not something I would buy.

Ranking the Switch drinks from best to worst:

1. Watermelon Strawberry
2. Kiwi Berry
3. Black Cherry
4. Orange Tangerine
